prod_short_desc: Set sail with Moana to restore the heart of Te Fiti!
prod_long_desc:
Discover the vibrant world of Disney’s Moana and join her on her epic adventure to bring back the heart of Te Fiti and restore harmony. This beautiful sailboat with opening storage under the deck, and island with transformation function, are perfect for recreating iconic scenes from the movie or creating new stories by the sea. Features a Moana mini-doll, Maui big figure, Heihei and two Kakamora.
Build Disney Princess Moana’s Ocean Voyage canoe with sail, opening deck, and a transforming Island of Te Fiti!
Featured in the award-winning Disney movie: Moana
Includes Moana mini-doll figure, Maui big figure, HeiHei the rooster, two buildable Kakamora pirates, plus a map, a catapult for the Kakamora, and the Heart of Te Fiti
LEGO Disney Princess building toys are compatible with all LEGO construction sets for creative building
Moana's boat measures over 6” high, 5” long and 5” wide, Island of Te Fiti measures over 4” high, 6” long and 1” long
307 pieces – For boys and girls between the ages of 6 and 12 years old
